definition: Ji River, former river of north-eastern China which disappeared after the Yellow River flooded in 1852
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The Yuanju old county is a famous historical city in old Jishui river valley.
sentences.chinese: 冤句縣故城是古濟水流域的一座歷史名城。

sentences.english: If they only know how to cook "water JACKIE water, " so who would want to drink the soup?
sentences.chinese: 若廚師只懂得“以水濟水”，這樣的湯誰願意喝？
